[h1]Portal Review[/h1]

Portal is a classic. Truly one of the best puzzle games of all time. It's immersive and literally makes you think outside the box. Or as GLaDOS would say, "Now you're thinking with portals."

Full of rich humor, and dark secrets, you'll almost never get bored of this game. The replay value is high, especially with the fun achievements and brain twisting extra challenges. The story, although very interesting, you actually can't understand all of it from just playing the game, which is frustrating because the story is REALLY good. In order to understand the story you have to read comics that Valve put out around the same time as Portal.

[h1]Concept Ratings (out of 10)[/h1]
[list]
[*]Graphics - 9
[*]Music - 9
[*]Animation - 8
[*]Story - 6
[*]Content - 7
[*]Controls - 8
[*]Gameplay - 10
[/list]
[h1]Conclusion[/h1]

Portal is by far one of the greatest puzzle games you could ever play. Although the story is lacking and the replay value is low, it's still very fun, and I highly recommend you play this before you play Portal 2.

8.1/10 - One of the greatest puzzle games ever, a classic, and deserves a third in the series.

[h1]空間転移を題材にした新感覚アクションパズルゲーム[/h1]
Valveの開発したポータルゲートからポータルゲートへ空間転移して進めるアクションパズルゲーム。
無機質にステージが進んでいく訳ではなく、主人公の身辺状況を絡めて進んでいくストーリー仕立て。
じわりじわりと難易度が上がっていくので、創造力や洞察力を振り絞って挑もう。

プレイ時間は4時間前後、実績は15、本編のみ終わらせるだけだと4。
上級ステージや詰み将棋チャレンジ的なステージあり。
難易度はそれなり高いが、複数解があるので少し考え方を変えるだけで解けてしまう程度。
安価でお手軽ながらわりと深いゲームなのでおすすめ。
试玩几分钟，你就会跟我一样爱上这款游戏

A história do jogo é incrível, um puzzle muito intrigante, os gráficos nem fazem diferença, pois é um jogo antigo, não tem muito que esperar, mas os puzzles deixam o jogo uma coisa muito incrível ! 

A história do jogo é relativamente normal, não é algo que você fica muito impressionado.

Obrigado pelo jogo Icaro Maia !

传送门1的关卡不难，2~3小时就可通关（我是先玩的2再玩的1），其次它的地位就不用多说了，必须好评

其实本人一直在思考为什么传送门会成为里程碑式的作品，想来想去无非就是那么几点（以下仅个人观点）：

1.好的游戏性
作为线性解密，在游戏的一开始就已经表明，玩家要做的就只是利用环境互动来完成关卡，并且每个关卡都不会让你觉得难到怀疑人生，保持了游戏的新鲜感和玩下去的动力。
2.好的创新性
在定义为“解密+闯关”的模式下，又让玩家感受到不一样的感觉。充满科技感的传送枪，下落几万米都摔不死的腿部保护装置，让玩法大大增加，巨大而又封闭的实验室，不停止的实验，成为了一种“限制”，[spoiler] 而正是有这种“限制”，才会有“逃脱限制”，于是后期雪儿逃离实验室，让刚刚熟悉实验室的玩家又一次感到“陌生又好奇” [spoiler]，并且作为旁白AI的G姐，和可爱又致命的小炮台，也让不简单的解密变得神秘又危险。

总之传送门1已经是佳作，2更是成为了神作，是V社必玩之一，现在入手建议打折入，不亏血赚。

Comme une Belle aux Bois Dormants d'un futur plus ou moins proche, vous vous réveillez dans votre tombeau de verre, étant éveillée par l'appel bienveillants d'une voix robotisée. Sous ses encouragements, vous êtes menée à traverser différentes expériences, remplissant leurs différents puzzles à coups de cubes, de lasers, mais surtout à l'aide du portal gul vous permettant de vous téléporter d'un bout à l'autre des salles aseptisées. Tout semble pour le mieux dans le meilleur des mondes. Jusqu'à l'arrivée des tourelles armées de mitrailleuses, des bains d'acides et des éclairs d'énergie. Pas toujours facile la vie de rat de laboratoire chez Aperture Science.

Référence dans la matière, Portal premier du nom est aujourd'hui un incontournable des puzzle games. Même une dizaine d'années après sa sortie, il reste toujours aussi agréable à jouer. C'est toujours un plaisir de retrouver les commentaires acerbes de notre chère GlaDOS, qui nous accompagne inlassablement à travers les énigmes des laboratoires abandonnés de la mythique Aperture Science. Qui n'a jamais voulu avoir un Portal Gun à la main et de chausser les bottes de Chell?

Malgré ses dix-neufs salles aménagées, le jeu se termine toutefois assez rapidement. On peut compter de 3 à 4 heures pour boucler le jeu une première fois, mais des salles supplémentaires et une vingtaine de défis viennent ajouter quelques heures de plaisir de plus.

Mais n'oublions jamais que:
The cake is a lie
The cake is a lie
The cake is a lie
The cake is a lie
The cake is a lie

J'avais au départ cracké portal car je pensais qu'il ne me plairait pas et ne voulait pas mettre 10€ dans un jeu qui ne me plairait pas.

Quand j'ai fini portal, il est directement monté dans le top 3 de mes jeu préféré. Je l'ai donc acheté. 

Voici les points positif : 
- Je rappelle pour ceux qui arrive ; que ce jeu date de 2007, pourtant, il égale voir dépasse certains jeux de grosse licence au niveau graphisme. Portal est vraiment beau pour son age.

- Une histoire a couper le souffle. Portal a ce que d'autre puzzle game n'ont pas : Une bonne histoire, que dis-je, une excellente histoire.

-Et dans une histoire, il y a des personnages. En l'ocurrence, dans portal il y en a 2 (presque 3 si on conte les tourelles) : Vous et Glados. Valve peut dire sans modestie que Glados est la méchante la plus sarcastique du monde, vous vous en souviendrez de Glados. Ce robot qui vous accompagne tout au long de l'aventure et vous assailli de blague pourri et de sarcasme sur votre nullité.

-Des puzzle, réfléchi mais pas trop dur non plus. (rien à ajouter)

Maintenant, les points négatifs : 

- Le jeu est court.

C'est tout pour les points négatifs (j'en ai cherché d'autre mais je ne voit pas).

Portal est un jeu quasiment parfait, il est beau, prenant et les personnages sont attachants.

Si vous hésitez car vous ne voulez pas mettre 10€ dans 5h de jeu. Attendez une promo (je l'ai eu à 0.80€) sinon allez y les yeux fermé.

Note : 9.5/10 (subjectif)

PS: je m'excuse pour les fautes de grammaire, d'orthographe et de conjugaison, je ne suis pas encore à la fac de lettres.

传送门，神作中的神作。游戏本身需要极高的空间想象力，却又要在同时打碎原本对于空间的所有概念。三维空间中的两道传送门，等效于折叠了空间，将原本不相干的两点接到了一起。传送门可折跃于两点，可串联空间，可构筑循环。解谜本身并不困难，只要多加思考与尝试便能破局，但其中对于空间概念的重构却是妙趣横生。通过传送门时会保留原有的速度与方向，如果执着于原有的对空间的理解，就很难想到解法。尤其是对于高度的重新定义，从低处直接上至高处只是小意思，复杂的是你可以从高处跃至低处的瞬间回到高处同时保留下落的速度但方向不尽相同，这个过程还可以叠加，让整个空间不再恒定，变数无数，状态无穷。难以想象Value在07年便做出如此真实的物理引擎。
游戏其实不难，3小时不看攻略很好过，只要记住你使用的不是镜子而是一个传送门就能解决大部分问题，过不去可以找找有什么踮脚（19关 手动滑稽）之类可以用用，最后的歌很好听。

私はパズルゲームは好きではないのですが、steamの義務教育ということでセールを機に購入しました。おもしろかったです。
ゲームシステム等については他の方のレビューでも言われていますが、私が個人的に気に入っているのは製作者解説です。クリアしたステージについて製作者の解説をみることができます。「ポータルの概念を理解させるためにこう言った配置にした」「テストプレイでこういったプレイがあったのでこのような配置にした」といった内容です。あとから見てみると、そういった工夫のおかげで最後まで快適にプレイできたことがよく分かります。製作者の工夫に素人ながら感心してしまいました。
つまるところ、丁寧に作られた良いゲームであるということです。万人にお勧めできます。

あ、他の方のレビューでもありますが、酔いやすいゲームですので三半規管が過敏な方は三半規管を取り外してプレイしてください。

[i]Adapted from my [url=https://jersie.wixsite.com/backlogbrawlers/post/review-portal-two-portals-two-people-our-take-on-bending-reality] gaming blog [/url][/i]
(Originally a co-written article, I only adapted my part because of length restrictions)


[h1] Portal makes you really want to know everything about itself. Luckily, there are numerous maps for puzzle verterans [/h1]

Recently, one of my friends (and a writer here) and I have taken up a bit of a co-op technique for going through shorter games. No, not playing the typical multiplayer style, but rather playing games we’ve never played over discord calls. This allows us to have company, while getting feedback from each other on the game. Sometimes even helping each other through certain parts (although it’s usually him helping me 😂) (how cute😊)
This time, we played through Portal. 
I will be referencing my 10 game commandments, alongside Bootyous’s review style today.
1. Gameplay
2. Story
3. Characters/World
4. Graphics
5. Sound
6. Optimization and bugs
7. Price Value
8. Replay value
9. Memorability 
10. Of course, enjoyment and fun!

I’ll have to say, funny enough, since this is one of the most renowned aspects of the game, the actual gameplay itself for me, was not my favorite. But honestly, I’m not too big a fan of puzzle games, so that’s another big reason. Most normal intelligence people will certainly find enjoyment in Portal. The game guides you through fairly gently, but eventually has quite challenging puzzles. Related to the gameplay, I have my own biggest reason for not fully enjoying this game, but I will get to that later. 

I love how the world and characters of this game are so wonderfully subtle, it makes you really want to know everything this game has to show you. And oh gosh, the “characters.” Despite the best interactions being with inanimate objects, I have not had such memorable connections with video game characters in a long while, and golly it is refreshing. In fact I think I’ll buy my own companion cube and turrent soon..The world, is also very fitting, having that painfully sterile air to it, but for being a test subject, it makes sense. 

Portal uses the GoldSrc engine, same as Half-life, so it uses many of the same assets, so the graphics are just as good as the engine, which was amazing for its time. (And I think still is)
I don’t remember much of the music during the game itself, my brain was too busy getting racked around puzzles, but the ending song. Oooooh
Even after a couple of days after playing the game, IT’S STILL STUCK IN MY HEAD! AND I LOVE IT! I’m adding it to my mixtape-
Also just going to note, I did not find any bugs, so that’s great! And it of course ran a crispy 240 fps on my computer. 

Getting a lovely score of 90 on meta critic, shows this game is a bit memorable and innovative like most Valve titles. Including what you unravel in the world and experience, it is quite unique. As for replayability, the sequel does have Steam Workshop, (this one does not) but it does have bonus levels in the game, and if you got the Orange Box bundle that comes with Portal: Still Alive, which I believe has 14 new bonus stages. Now for the price. For some, spending $10 on a 5-hour experience may not be that amazing, but Steam with its legendary sales and all, definitely includes their own titles which get discounted to a dollar. If you buy em’ for console physically at let’s say GameStop, they are definitely going to be that cheap as well. Great value! Overall, I enjoyed every aspect of the game, except some parts of playing it. A bit weird huh? Well, I (and probably many others) sometimes experience nausea or lightheaded-ness playing certain games. It was very prevalent here for me. While it took a good 3 and a half hours for it to set in, it was not pretty. That was the only reason I couldn’t finish this in one sitting with Bootyous (props to you man for beating it in one go)
As Bootyous mentioned before about me, It really sucks that a glaring flaw in a game is experiencing physical suffering when it’s not really its fault. In conclusion, every aspect in the game may not be the best ever, but there is certainly good enough in every corner of the game for a gamer to enjoy. Highly recommend for puzzle-lovers, casual gamers, game history-lovers and even us backlog brawlers with so much to fight! 👍 (Also, you guys should try playing single-player games with your friends, it’s a blast!)
See ya’ll! Imma rest in my homemade pod, until GLaDOS comes to try and eat my soul again. 

PROS-
-Unique and Innovative puzzle gameplay
-Dark humor and cute inanimate objects
-Subtle story that leaves you wanting more
-Glorious Goldsrc engine
-Still Alive
-No bugs found
-Bonus levels
-Frequently cheap

CONS-
- Strict on method of puzzle solving
- Story does not go very in-depth
- Crusty character model
- Not much other music through the rest of the game
- Can potentially give certain gamers nausea/light-headed-ness

JERSIE’S GAME RATING: 8.9

Rating specifics:
1. Gameplay - 8/10
2. Story - 8/10
3.Characters/World - 10/10
4. Graphics - 8/10 
5. Sound - 9/10
6. Optimization and bugs - 10/10
7. Price Value - 10/10
8. Replay value - 10/10
9. Memorability - 10/10
10. Of course, enjoyment and fun! - 6/10

Aaaah Portal... Premier vrai puzzle game hautement addictif, avec une scénario et de l'humour !
18 salles de tests "préparées", puis le reste d'un jeu qui restera gravé dans les mémoires ... "The cake is a lie !"

Bref, Portal est un jeu énorme, avec un niveau de difficulté correct pour la campagne, mais alors de quoi s'arracher les cheveux pour les défis ! Il y a de quoi faire.

Portal est un jeu bien connu, je ne pense pas que l'expliquer soit nécessaire. Par contre, c'est un must-have et must-do pour tout joueur qui utilise Steam !

Portal to już klasyk. Tajemnicza fabuła i oryginalny pomysł zrobiły swoje. 
Gra polega na rozwiązywaniu komór testowych przy pomocy działa portalowego, które, no, wytwarza portale. Wchodzisz jednym, wychodzisz drugim. Dodajcie trochę humoru i genialny soundtrack.

Warto spróbować, kosztuje grosze na promocji i można ją przejść w jeden wieczór.
W sumie szkoda że tak szybko.
游戏性非常不错，足够的创意足够的提示不算简单的关卡，可能会因为某关过不去而生气，但只要冷静好好看就一定能找到突破的地方，然后会觉得，哇，为什么这么简单我都没发现
Uno de los mejores juegos de puzzles.
